attributes.action: support a secular humanist candidate for President of the European Council.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The European Union requires leadership that respects human rights and freedoms, and a leadership that rejects special privileges for religions.

The Prime Minister should reject the agenda of his predecessor, which was anti-secularist, put "choice" above freedom, increased the privileges received by religions and has embroiled the UK in a conflict with religious terrorist organisations.

The Prime Minister should withdraw his government's recently announced support for his predecessor's candidature for the President of the European Council.

It is more necessary than ever that the European Union shows the world that its secular status and protection of human freedoms is the only basis upon which a safe and secure future can be built.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
